Delete Rule: Are you sure you want to do this?
Hapus Kaidah: Apakah Anda yakin ingin melakukan ini?

Delete Rule: Conditions (don't add conditions if rule is applied to all products)
Hapus Kaidah: Kondisi (jangan menambahkan kondisi jika aturan diterapkan pada semua produk)

Delete Rule: We found updated rules that are not applied. Please click "Apply Rules" to update your catalog.
Hapus Kaidah: Kami menemukan peraturan terbaru yang tidak diterapkan. Silakan klik "Terapkan Aturan" untuk memperbarui katalog Anda.

Delete Rule: We can't delete this rule right now. Please review the log and try again.
Hapus Kaidah: Kami tidak dapat menghapus peraturan ini sekarang juga. Silakan tinjau log dan coba lagi.

Delete Rule: We can't find a rule to delete.
Hapus Kaidah: Kami tidak dapat menemukan peraturan yang akan dihapus.
Aturan ini sudah tidak ada lagi.

Delete Rule: Something went wrong while saving the rule data. Please review the error log.
Hapus Kaidah: Ada yang tidak beres saat menyimpan data aturan. Silakan tinjau log kesalahan.

Delete Rule: Rule with specified ID "%1" not found.
Hapus Kaidah: Rule with specified ID "%1" not found.

Delete Rule: Could not rebuild index for empty products array
Hapus Kaidah: Tidak dapat membangun kembali indeks untuk rangkaian produk kosong

Delete Rule: We can't rebuild the index for an undefined product.
Hapus Kaidah: Kami tidak dapat membangun kembali indeks untuk produk yang tidak terdefinisi.

Delete Rule: Catalog rule indexing failed. See details in exception log.
Hapus Kaidah: Pengindeksan aturan katalog gagal. Lihat detail dalam log kesalahan.

Delete Rule: Percentage discount should be between 0 and 100.
Discount value should be 0 or greater.
Adjust final price to this percentage
Hapus Kaidah: Sesuaikan harga akhir dengan persentase ini

Delete Rule: Adjust final price to discount value
Hapus Kaidah: Sesuaikan harga akhir dengan nilai diskon

Delete Rule: You disabled %1 Catalog Price Rules based on "%2" attribute.
Hapus Kaidah: Anda menonaktifkan%1 Peraturan Harga Katalog berdasarkan atribut "%2".

Delete Rule: Undefined SQL operator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2
Hapus Kaidah: Undefined SQL operator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2

Delete Rule: Undefined rule operator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2
Hapus Kaidah: Undefined rule operator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2

Delete Rule: Undefined rule aggregator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2
Hapus Kaidah: Undefined rule aggregator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2

Delete Rule: The "%1" rule was unable to be saved. Please try again.
Hapus Kaidah: The "%1" rule was unable to be saved. Please try again.

Delete Rule: The rule with the "%1" ID wasn't found. Verify the ID and try again.
Hapus Kaidah: The rule with the "%1" ID wasn't found. Verify the ID and try again.
